name: NEWPORT SHIP YARD, INC. v. RHODE ISLAND COMMISSION FOR HUMAN RIGHTS and Stephen Gordon
name_abbreviation: Newport Ship Yard, Inc. v. Rhode Island Commission for Human Rights

parties: NEWPORT SHIP YARD, INC. v. RHODE ISLAND COMMISSION FOR HUMAN RIGHTS and Stephen Gordon.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is granted.

attorneys: Moore, Virgadamo & Lynch, Ltd., Newport, Joseph R. Palumbo, Jr., for plaintiff-respondent.
Dorothy L. Lohmann, Providence, for defendant-petitioner-Stephen Gordon.
casebody.head_matter:
NEWPORT SHIP YARD, INC. v. RHODE ISLAND COMMISSION FOR HUMAN RIGHTS and Stephen Gordon.
No. 82-60-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
April 1, 1982.
Moore, Virgadamo & Lynch, Ltd., Newport, Joseph R. Palumbo, Jr., for plaintiff-respondent.
Dorothy L. Lohmann, Providence, for defendant-petitioner-Stephen Gordon.
